column1: Assigned vibrational modes in TeO2-BaO-Bi2O3 glasses
Assigned vibrational modes in TeO2-BaO-Bi2O3 glasses
Stretching and bending vibration of Te-O-Te linkages in TeO4 (tbp's), TeO3+d  polyhedra and TeO3 (tp's)
Vibration of the continuous network comprised of TeO4 tbp's
Antisymmetric vibrations of Te-O-Te in TeO3+d , TeO4, TeO3 and TeO4 networks
Stretching vibrations between tellurium and non-bridging oxygen (NBO's) atoms
Continuous network vibration of TeO4 tbp's and a TeO- stretching vibration of TeO3+d  poyhedra or TeO3
